item.title: This One Trick Will Make Adding Music to Your iPhone 13 Videos a Breeze!
item.description: Introduction Adding music to your iPhone 13 videos can be a hassle. However, with the right trick, you can make the process a breeze! This guide will walk you through the steps needed to add music to your iPhone 13 videos quickly and easily. Step-by-Step Guide The first step is to download the necessary software. This software will allow you to connect your iPhone to your computer and drag and drop the music into the video.
